title: you can't threaten to troll if you already purposely fed 6 kills to the enemy team

replies.body: what if im so bad that i didn't mean to feed 6 kills and i threaten to troll
what are you gonna do, give the enemy team 20 gold and a death timer?
He can tell the enemy team where your jungler is and keep your team from sneaking drakes/Herald/baron, etc.
Those scumbags....
Well your opponents could build Mejai's...

Tell enemy team u r gonna int and that they should get mejai's. And dont feed.
Enemy team wastes gold on mejai's.
Profit.

Plot twist: He's still bad and enemy team full-stacks Mejai's.
Even their Riven.
That Riven must still cry themselves to sleep every night after Sword of the Occult was removed.
She can't get to sleep because of the never dying party that started when it was.

And she can't simply close the window, because she has no home.

http://i.imgur.com/SMWWjHG.jpg?1

Name checks out.

Icon makes it perfect.

This happens now and then in ARAM.
Someone goes 2/12, blames everyone else, when nobody puts up with their shit, they threaten "Okay I go feed".
"Like, dude, you already do feed"

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BxYXf2_CYAAz0Kq.jpg

It's like the 'I'll leave then.' Okay, do.

And? We were losing WITH you. Are we supposed to lose differently without you here?
what if you play trundle the troll?
litterally every adc player LMFAO.

ya you can even if someone does bad and feeds 6 kills it still possible to win but if they give up and really start trolling it can ruin any chance of a comeback and from the way you post this you were probably flaming him making him play worse and want to just give up.

You also can't react negatively to someone threatening to troll.

Actually, you basically can't do anything without being at risk for punishment
given how liberally I insult my teammates I beg to differ
Somehow someone will take offense to it, report you for passive-aggressiveness, and get you punished for whatever you did.
umm okay ? not sure what's the purpose of your thread is or who it's aimed towards but ok
It's this thing people do when they're feeding: they start trolling or saying they weren't trying as though that will make people think they're not bad.
I mean, they still can. There's nothing stopping them from opening chat and typing that out at any point.
Pfft. Amateurs. Pros will ks to reset their value or at least get an assist and THEN threaten to troll. Do your research people.
lol
